scan_linter_check.description: Checks if a script contains the string "[0]" which indicates the use of an anti-pattern where an element of an array is references by its absolute position instead by using an index variable (within a loop) or a an iterator pattern.
scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - [0] anti-pattern
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Review the code carefully and see if really the first element of an array is of interest and should be references explicitly. Why is it the first element? Has it been verified that the element really exists? How are subsequent elements of the array processed?
